alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 12:57PM EDT until September 07 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 1256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raystown Dam, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntingdon, Mount Union, Allensville, Rockhill Furnace, Raystown Dam, Trough Creek State Park, McConnellstown, Petersburg, Broad Top City, Three Springs, Mapleton and Orbisonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this severe thunderstorm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
